From: "Markus.Mirsberger" <markus.mirsberger@...>

Hi,

is it possible to limit the amount of crawled pages per domain when I 
use a seeds file with multiple domains?
For example I have a seeds file with around 50 domains but I only want 
max. 100 pages from each domain.

Thanks,
Markus
